## Overview

-   This problem is an application of the strategies from the notes in @sec-notes-dashboards, where we learned how to create an effective dashboard, that also utilizes some techniques from the notes in @sec-notes-parameters about the use of parameters.

-   **This is a re-creation assignment demonstrating your ability to follow along with a tutorial using a new dataset and applying similar methods to new problems.**
